comment_body:
/u/adriaticwaves, I have found an error in your post:

 > “~~Its~~ [**It's**] like basic”

It looks like you, adriaticwaves, have posted an error and ought to have said “polite / ~~Its~~ [**It's**] like basic” instead. ‘Its’ is possessive; ‘it's’ means ‘it is’ or ‘it has’.

 ^(This is an automated bot. I do not intend to shame your mistakes. If you think the errors which I found are incorrect, please contact me through DMs or contact my owner EliteDaMyth!)
